post.text: THANK YOU Phoenix, Arizona! Time for new POWERFUL leadership. Just imagine what WE can accomplish in our first 100 days! #DrainTheSwamp

comment.text: The stupidity of Hillary trolls who prefer to vote for a criminal and continue the decay of this country than to accept changes !!

replies.text: Just convince them not to vote. Less votes for Hillary doesn't hurt trump. Everybody doesn't have to be converted to a trump supporter. They just have to be unconverted from Hillary.
